title: True Minded Gaming is holding tryouts for several positions!
body:
Hello everyone, True Minded Gaming is holding tryouts for the following positions:
ADC(2)
Mid(1)
Top(1)
Jungle(2)
Support(1)
Coach(2)

Do not worry about rank, because we are looking for members to fill up the missing spots on 2 of our teams, so we will try people out for the team they are most closely ranked to. 
Application:
IGN:
Age:
Position:
Timezone:
Availability:
Working mic(no background noise):
Discord:
Are you looking for a competitive team that will be playing several times a week:




Please do not add me in game, I will be adding everyone who applies for the team to discuss tryouts.

replies.body:
IGN: i Aelon i
Age:20
Role: Jg/Mid/Adc in that order
Rank: Platinum 1
5s Experience?: Played on 2 long term tournament teams one was reached diamond 5 and other reached platinum 2
Are you willing to listen to staff(Coach, Analyst, Manager etc.)?: yup yup
Top 3-5 Champs?: Lee Sin, Shyvana. Rammus | GP, Ahri and Ori | Lucian, Kog, Jihn
Strengths?: I know when to be aggressive/passive have a very dominant play style great at lane swaps, rotations and shotcalling
Weaknesses?: I dont play even solo/dq, and i dont main one role
Discord?: yup
Timezone?: CST
